channel.title: Faith on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Faith on Silence Speaks

item.title: Congenealogy
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I can tell by your withering leaves And dwindling fruits, Your outstretched branch Has lost touch with its roots. You have overextended To give wind its due chase, But the rush that you seek Will destroy you posthaste.

item.title: Nothing To Lose
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: You can't be let go Once you've clung to the truth. With your treasures in heaven, You've got nothing to lose. Now free to live out your life With nothing to prove Save for the love in your heart You long to share with your crew.
